title: Some board ideas
body:
* http://i.imgur.com/p6vnXsr.png **Underline Button**
* http://i.imgur.com/JeDBK9b.png **Collapse Button:** More info see [details tag](http://www.w3schools.com/tags/tag_details.asp).
* http://i.imgur.com/DZJ6Dg9.png **NPC Button: **Contains templates for icons for monsters, buildings & other units.
* **Patch Stamp:** Shows the current patch based on the date the post is last edited.

**Q&A** *(here could the collapse button be usefull)*

* What about abilities?
*Well I think it could be intressting but than again it should be optional. What about include them by a command in the search function from the champion icon like: "<champname>" will also reveal the ability/passive icons. Or when searching only the ability icons something like "ability:<abilityname>" Additionaly further advanced option can be included like "<champname>:skin", "<champname>:ability, "skin:<skiname>", etc...
*

replies.body:
Cool, I think underline may have its uses for emphasis and may be something we consider. I've noticed a lot of requests for a patch stamp which is interesting on its own as a request. 

No promises that we'll be able to implement any of these but I like where they're coming from â€” I'll toss them onto the list for our team to review.
